verbose_text: Because unlike all the AD studies in which study inclusion criteria usually restricts the minimum age of the study sample to age 60 or 65 years and older, FHS, through its multi-generational design, has been able to provide evidence that mid-life health matters, and more recently early adult health matters because enrollment of their subjects span the entire adult lifespan.
evidence: AD studies in which study inclusion criteria usually restricts the minimum age
